targets.rawSql: SELECT COALESCE(percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cpu_utilization), 0.0) as value FROM pod_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
SELECT COALESCE(percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cpu_utilization), 0.0) as value FROM pod_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*)::float / GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(timestamp) - MIN(timestamp))), 1), 0.0) as value FROM pod_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(COALESCE(memory_utilization, 0)), 0.0) as value FROM pod_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(COALESCE(memory_utilization, 0)), 0.0) as value FROM pod_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(COALESCE(memory_utilization, 0)), 0.0) as value FROM pod_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', timestamp) as time,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as value
FROM pod_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', timestamp) as time,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as value
FROM pod_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
